name: Korean Ground Beef
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef, 5 cloves of garlic, 1 tbsp grated ginger, 2 tsp toasted sesame oil, 1/2 cup soy sauce, 1/3 cup brown sugar, 1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper, 6 green onions, 4 cups cooked rice, 1 tbsp sesame seeds
method: 1. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add beef and cook, stirring and crumbling into small pieces until browned, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain excess grease.

name: Air Fryed Pork Chops
ingredients: 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp parsley, 1/2 tsp black peepper, 5 oz pork chops, 2 tbsp olive oil
method: 1. Preheat the air fryer to 380 degrees F (190 degrees C).
